misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, known for his calm demeanor and calculated approach to the game. Representing Keimola Golf, he is also an ambassador for the AimPoint method, bringing an analytical edge to the greens.

With 8 past appearances at the tournament, Timo has secured the Hector Trophée on 3 occasions, showcasing his ability to perform under pressure in the pairs format. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him, his focus remains steadfast on teamwork and strategic play.

Though not currently slated to compete in Hector Trophée 2025, golf enthusiasts know that the unpredictable nature of the sport leaves room for potential surprises. We hope to see Timo back on the course soon, sharing his expertise and passion for the game.
